purpopse: When is it? Every first Wednesday of the month we will gather to have lunch. On Wednesday at 11:30 we will announce the lunchgroups. Afterwards you can go lunch together, probably between 12:30 and 1:30. But hey feel free to decide on your own!
Who is joining? Just check the group members ;)
How can I leave? If you want to leave me, you will break my heart. But if there is no other way for you, just leave the group :(
